abstract: Romanian National Ballet artistic director Johan Kobborg and dancer Alina Cojocaru return to company in deal brokered by country’s culture minister that will install new interim manager for Bucharest National Opera.
lead_paragraph: A Romanian government-brokered plan paved the way for the return of the company’s artistic director, Johan Kobborg, and the dancer Alina Cojocaru.

headline.main: 2 Stars Rejoin Bucharest Opera’s Ballet Company After Clash
headline.print_headline: 2 Bucharest Opera Ballet Stars Return to Company After Clash

snippet: A Romanian government-brokered plan paved the way for the return of the company’s artistic director, Johan Kobborg, and the dancer Alina Cojocaru.
